Package com.trading.application.portfoliostock.entity

Class PortfolioStock

java.lang.Object
com.trading.application.portfoliostock.entity.PortfolioStock
@Component public class PortfolioStock extends Object
The PortfolioStock class represents a stock in a portfolio. It includes details such as quantity, date bought, stock bought price, and allocation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PortfolioStock()
    Constructs an empty PortfolioStock object with default values.

    Constructs a new PortfolioStock with the provided details.
    PortfolioStock(PortfolioStock other)
    Constructs a new PortfolioStock by copying the details from another PortfolioStock object.
